title: My level only says I'm level 3, and I can't comment or post.
body:
Does the level on the forum differ from in game? If so, how do I level up?

If not, my real account is well over 30 so could someone please help?

replies.body: Sometimes your profile needs to sync up to the boards when posting for the first time.  If this is still an issue, this[ syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) should help!
